title: BsSndRpt.Exe has Stopped Working
body:
Expected argument 'i'.

Usage:gBsSndRpt [@argfile] [/?h|help] /i  [/q] /c  /a  /v  /l  [/dll] [/dc]

@argfile   Read arguments from a file
/?                         Show usage
/i   Configuration file
/q                         Silent mode
/c            Vendor name
/a             Application name
/v             Application version
/d             Description
/f              Minidump file
/x             Additional Files
/m            MFA
/n             Dotnet
/r              Repeat count
/z              Zip
/l  User Logfile Path
/dl                          Debug to Log File
/dc                         Debug to Console



Help me Please
Thank you

replies.body: It looks like you've got some info from a log here, but can you describe the exact issue you're having and what other bugsplats or error messages you see?
